name: EXPECTD_GOAL_ALERT
description: It contains the information about the user and the instant for the goal alert for the care plan.

columns.name: CARE_INTG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the careplan record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: GOAL_ALERT_INS_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time of the expected goal alert.
